posts.post_content: I bought this from a fellow board member a few months ago, but have since upgraded.  It was an SGC 2 when I bought it, but I cracked it out to display raw (like all my T206s).  I will include the flip with the sale.  I paid $100 for it back then, selling for $80 delivered PayPal only.  Given what I paid, price is firm.  Thanks for looking!
